con:soapui-project.name: DirectMessageTestingWithEventLogging
con:soapui-project.con:description: Sometimes the delays set in the testcases may not be enough. So we need to make sure the email the required MDNs/messages are received before we count event logs. Otherwise the event log count checking may fail.

con:config.script: context.sendEmailSmtp("Content","Sending smtp messagae using trust bundles in database","murthy@direct.connectopensource.org", "provider1@direct.sitenv.org", "54.85.35.69", "25","direct","Connect#2014");

con:testStep.name: Check Processed And Despatched MDNs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify the email account to see if you got the Despatched and Processed MDNs.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Should have received the Despatched and Processed MDNs in the email client

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 6 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 2 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MDN"')[0] assert 2 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MDN"')[0] }
context.sendEmailSmtp("Content","Sending smtp messagae using anchors in database","murthy@direct.connectopensource.org", "provider1@direct.sitenv.org", "54.85.35.69", "25","direct","Connect#2014");

con:testStep.name: Check Despatched and Processed MDNs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify the email account to see if you got the Despatched MDN.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Should have received the Despatched MDN

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 6 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 2 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MDN"')[0] assert 2 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MDN"')[0] }

context.sendEmailSmtp("Content","Sending smtp message without using the trust stores and anchors in database","murthy@direct.connectopensource.org", "provider1@direct.sitenv.org", "54.85.35.69", "25","direct","Connect#2014");

con:testStep.name: Check Despatched and Processed MDNs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify the email account to see if you got the Despatched MDN.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Should have received the Despatched and Processed MDNs

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 6 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 2 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_MDN"')[0] assert 2 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_MDN"')[0] }

con:testStep.name: Send an email from sitenv
con:testStep.con:description: 1. Go to the web site http://sitenv.org/web/site/home 2. Click on View Details button under Transport Sandbox section 3. Click on Direct Transport Test Tool 4. Enter your Direct email address in the Enter Your Endpoint Name text box 5. Click on Pick Sample button and select a sample C-CDA file 6. Click on Send message button

con:config.con:expectedResult: Wait till the email is received and displayed in the inbox. Check for 4 rows in the event table.

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 4 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MDN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MDN"')[0] }

con:testStep.name: Send an email from sitenv
con:testStep.con:description: 1. Go to the web site http://sitenv.org/web/site/home 2. Click on View Details button under Transport Sandbox section 3. Click on Direct Transport Test Tool 4. Enter your Direct email address in the Enter Your Endpoint Name text box 5. Click on Pick Sample button and select a sample C-CDA file 6. Click on Send message button

con:config.con:expectedResult: Wait till the email is received and displayed in the inbox. Check for 4 rows in the event table.

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 4 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MDN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MDN"')[0] }

con:testStep.name: Send and Email to Direct
con:testStep.con:description: 1. Go to the web site http://sitenv.org/web/site/home 2. Click on View Details button under Transport Sandbox section 3. Click on Direct Transport Test Tool 4. Enter your Direct email address in the Enter Your Endpoint Name text box 5. Click on Pick Sample button and select a sample C-CDA file 6. Click on Send message button

con:config.con:expectedResult: Wait till the email is received and displayed in the inbox. Check for 4 rows in the event table.

con:config.script: context.withSql('eventdb') {sql -> assert 4 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable'))[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_INBOUND_DIRECT"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="BEGIN_OUTBOUND_MDN"')[0] assert 1 == sql.firstRow('select count(*) from ' + context.findProperty('EventTable') + ' where name="END_OUTBOUND_MDN"')[0] }
